facts.1: International Joke Day is celebrated on July 1st to encourage people to share jokes and spread laughter.
facts.2: The day was created by Wayne Reinagel in 1994 to promote the art of joke-telling.
facts.3: Laughter has been shown to have numerous health benefits, including reducing stress and boosting the immune system.

facts.1: Canada Day is celebrated on July 1st to commemorate the anniversary of the confederation of Canada in 1867.
facts.2: The day marks the unification of the three separate colonies of the United Province of Canada, New Brunswick, and Nova Scotia into a single Dominion within the British Empire.
facts.3: Canada Day is celebrated with parades, fireworks, concerts, and other patriotic events across the country.

Day 3.title: National Creative Ice Cream Flavors Day

facts.1: National Creative Ice Cream Flavors Day is observed on July 1st to encourage people to try new and unique ice cream flavors.
facts.2: The day celebrates the creativity and innovation of ice cream makers who experiment with unusual ingredients and combinations.
facts.3: Some popular creative ice cream flavors include bacon, lavender, avocado, and even garlic.
